name: LIFTOFF (itch) (PixelSoba, Lui, Ysendrin)
description:
LIFTOFF, a space chase!

In this universe, a crew is on the run and try to survive waves of enemies in rhythm.

They'll learn that every journey is a chase of fights and rests and every enemy has its beat.

How to play:
Dodge enemy attacks using the arrows or WASD.
Survive till the end!

Made by PixelSoba and Ysendrin with Godot for the Rhythm Jam 2021.
Music: Liftoff by Lui
